game.name: Burger Chef
game.description:
You are an excellent chef and today you have decided to open up the first burger restaurant in a city you live. Being a head chef, you take care of making all of the scrumptious food items being served to your clients. Remember you have to complete the request of your guests in a limited time period. Are you ready to accept this new cooking challenge? Join Burger Chef and be prepared to prepare chicken nuggets, French fries, finger-licking burgers and more!

Make sure to cook a perfect burger and surprise all your clients with the ultimate cooking abilities. Making burgers on your customer request is your unique selling point. Hear the requirements of your customers carefully before delivering their orders in this HTML5 cooking game! Serve them with two patties if they want two and get ready to please them with two extra tomatoes as per their needs! Remember you have to do every possible effort to make your customers feel happy since they can play a vital role in making your business successful.

There are different ingredients to put together for you and you have to focus only on completing the orders successfully in each level. Your late response could make get your customers angry and they leave the counter in case if you wait too long. You would have three different and amazing modes like career, time attack and chef championship. Good luck to create the best burger recipe in this amazing restaurant game! Find some more funny and interesting titles from the category of free cooking games that you can play on multiple devices without download!
